author: perrotta
body:
Removal of Ecal/ES-UnpackerWorkerESProducers.
Migration to new template fixing a Tau producer for the upcoming migration of tau paths.
Fix of pA (and a couple more) paths with the ECal global unpacker, from M. Sani

This PR fixes and superseedes #3104 

It would be nice to have it in pre6,
title: HLT plus ecal fixes
